---
title: "06: Signals and Noise"
---

::: {.cell hash='2016-06_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_8a76d0c7c23c51dd7c8d7c3e74c91752'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(mistlecode)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
To install `mistlecode` yourself, run `devtools::install_github('guslipkin/mistlecode')`.

 Also loading:  cipheR data.table dplyr purrr slider stringr tidyverse glue
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
dt <-
  readLines("input.txt") |>
  str_split("") |>
  map(~ data.frame(t(.x))) |>
  bind_rows()
```
:::


## Part 1

omg. This is gonna be so easy.

Edit: it was!


::: {.cell hash='2016-06_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_1a98b567606651b5c134d73f16d6c01a'}

```{.r .cell-code}
dt |>
  map_chr(\(x) {
    x |>
      table() |>
      sort(decreasing = TRUE) |>
      head(1) |>
      names()
  }) |>
  paste0(collapse = "")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "bjosfbce"
```
:::
:::


## Part 2

Classic. Just drop `decreasing = TRUE`.


::: {.cell hash='2016-06_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_caef4ed7e52da9c4e94e060a8e4df1b7'}

```{.r .cell-code}
dt |>
  map_chr(\(x) {
    x |>
      table() |>
      sort() |>
      head(1) |>
      names()
  }) |>
  paste0(collapse = "")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "veqfxzfx"
```
:::
:::
